about_the_game:
A new Campaign

Follow the story of Cnaeus Julius Agricola in his conquests in northern Britannia through 4 additional missions for Citadelum, taking place from 79 AD to 84 AD.

Build and conquer in new biomes

Visit a new snow biome. Build your settlement on four original maps, with new difficulties and geographical features. Face a more challenging experience in the confines of the Roman Empire.

Fight against a new enemy

The legions of Julius Agricola will have to face the tribes of Caledonia, famous for their guerrilla style. Lead your legions in more intricate battlefields and reinforce the defenses of your camps.

A more challenging experience

Test everything you have learned in the original Citadelum campaign. New, tougher conditions await you in which to prove that you are a master of resource management, settlement planning and defense construction. For the Senate and the people of Rome.
